div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 08:35 am CDT

td.span: Mostly sunny, with a high near 77. West southwest wind 11 to 16 mph becoming north northwest in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 24 mph.
Partly cloudy, with a low around 43. North northeast wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

A 40 percent chance of showers after 1pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 71. Light and variable wind becoming northwest 9 to 14 mph in the afternoon. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.
